title: Love Island's Jess Shears glowing in video with new baby after birth
text:
And there’s us thinking being tired is an excuse not to go to the gym… (Picture: Jess Shears/Dom Lever)

Jess Shears seems to be adjusting to life with a baby very nicely as she shared a video of her enjoying motherhood while relaxing on a lazy Sunday afternoon.

The Love Island star announced on Saturday that she had given birth to her first child with Dom Lever, with both former Islanders sharing adorable pictures of their little one sleeping to Instagram.

On Sunday evening, 26-year-old Jess shared a video to her Instagram Stories with an obligatory comedy filter as she enjoyed some quality time with her baby, panning the phone camera down to show the child’s little feet (so tiny!) and flashing her incredible looking body in the process.

Now, we know the post pregnancy ‘snap back’ is overrated and everyone has to move at their own pace, but we can’t believe how amazing and happy she looks!

Advertisement

Advertisement

However, that change hasn’t been without hard work, with Dom documenting the couple, who met on the ITV2 dating show in 2017, returning to the gym in the morning with a video of Jess lifting weights captioned: ‘We back.’

Well, there’s us never having an excuse for skipping a workout again…

Jess is loving mum life (Picture: Jess Shears)

However, after Jess’ found herself faced with comments asking why she was back in the gym so soon after first posting about their child, whose name and sex is yet to be announced, Jess clapped back at her these online critics.

‘Can people stop assuming they know anything about the birth of our child,’ she wrote.

Jess is having none of it (Picture: Jess Shears)

‘Just because we chose to share an image yesterday doesn’t mean that’s when they were born.

‘Dom, baby and I are happy, healthy and recovering at our own rate.’

Well that’s what we like to hear!
